Sentencas: In this paper, dense and crack-free yttrium-doped barium zirconate (BZY) thin films were fabricated by chemical solution deposition (CSD) with rapid thermal processing (RTP) at low sintering temperature.
Titulo: Rapid thermal processing of chemical-solution-deposited yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin

Sentencas: BZY thin film without barium carbonate phase was obtainable after annealing at 700 degrees C for 1 h, which represents the lowest temperature reported in the literature.
Titulo: Rapid thermal processing of chemical-solution-deposited yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin

Sentencas: X-ray reflectivity study showed that the relative density of resultant BZY thin film was approximately 90%, indicating the effective densification of BZY at low temperature sintering by RTP.
Titulo: Rapid thermal processing of chemical-solution-deposited yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin

Sentencas: Microstructural analysis of BZY thin film showed that the film was dense, smooth and homogenous without cracks or interconnected pores.
Titulo: Rapid thermal processing of chemical-solution-deposited yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin

Sentencas: Thus, CSD method combined with RTP is promising for the fabrication of BZY electrolyte thin film due to the low processing temperature and high quality of the obtained film.
Titulo: Rapid thermal processing of chemical-solution-deposited yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin
Rapid thermal processing of chemical-solution-deposited yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin
Rapid thermal processing of chemical-solution-deposited yttrium-doped barium zirconate thin
